message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true worth. I could consider $10,500.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
